page.title: 07A typical day in my life
page.content: I bring sandwiches for lunch as I don't like school dinners.Sometimes in the lunch break we use the school computers.In the afternoon we have more leisure subjects like art or music.We learn to play the cornet,violin and recorder.We have rugby or football practice one afternoon a week.We all learn Welsh as a second language. School closes at 3.15 p.m. and after tea I usually play on my bike.I live in Glanrhyd and sometimes play on Glanrhyd Primary School field,or go and watch my friends in the swimming pool at Maesydderwen Comprehensive School. Later at home we enjoy playing card games like "Whist".I like reading in bed before I fall asleep at 9.45p.m
